definition: assistance to the poor/poverty alleviation
to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
poor/inadequate/deficient/garrulous
to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions

sentences.english: Aiming at achieving Pro- Poor growth and development with equity.
sentences.chinese: 实现扶贫增长和公平发展目标。

sentences.english: We should unswervingly uphold the poverty alleviation policy to lead all rural works in the poverty-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 坚持以扶贫攻坚总揽贫困地区农村工作全局。

sentences.english: Improved governance leads to higher standards of living and poverty alleviation.
sentences.chinese: 改善治理可以带来生活水平的提高和扶贫成效。

sentences.english: The authors put forward the countermeasures and proposals tourism aid-the-poor in Wanyuan .
sentences.chinese: 并就万源实施旅游扶贫提出对策和建议。

sentences.english: We increased spending on efforts to help the rural poor through development.
sentences.chinese: 坚持开发式扶贫方针，加大扶贫投入力度。

sentences.english: We increased spending on efforts to help the rural poor through development.
sentences.chinese: 坚持开发式扶贫方针，加大扶贫投入力度。

sentences.english: The CDD-based projects will remain the major models in alleviating poverty in Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 社区主导型发展项目仍将是印尼开展扶贫的主要模式。

sentences.english: In 2002 the country was classified as key counties for poverty alleviation and development work.
sentences.chinese: 2002年被列为国家扶贫开发工作重点县。

sentences.english: We will intensify poverty alleviation work and increase investment init to further reduce the number of people living in poverty.
sentences.chinese: 加大扶贫投入和工作力度，进一步减少贫困人口。

sentences.english: Fifth, we will intensify our efforts to alleviate poverty through development.
sentences.chinese: 五是加大扶贫开发力度。

sentences.english: We will intensify our efforts to alleviate poverty through development.
sentences.chinese: 我们要加大扶贫开发力度。

sentences.english: We will raise the poverty line, and intensify our efforts to alleviate poverty through development.
sentences.chinese: 提高扶贫标准，加大扶贫开发力度。

sentences.english: We will raise the poverty line, and intensify our efforts to alleviate poverty through development.
sentences.chinese: 提高扶贫标准，加大扶贫开发力度。

sentences.english: One of the key measures for making aid accessible to individual households is providing small-amount credit loans.
sentences.chinese: 小额信贷是扶贫到户的关键措施之一。

sentences.english: Standardizing the work of development-oriented poverty alleviation .
sentences.chinese: 推进扶贫开发的规范化建设。
